bibl.title: Homer in Malibu.
bibl.note: P. Getty Museum Inv. 76 AI 56. First cent. B.C. The recto has been identified by: J. Frel, Antiquities in the JPGM, Pamphlet 2, Nov.-Dec. 1977, as Odyssey X, 397-403. The verso still defies attempts at identification. It might be a paraphrase, commentary or scholion pertaining to the text of the recto.
bibl.seg: P. Getty Museum Inv. 76 AI 56. First cent. B.C. The recto has been identified by: J. Frel, Antiquities in the JPGM, Pamphlet 2, Nov.-Dec. 1977, as Odyssey X, 397-403.
